io.micronaut.kubernetes.client.v1

Interface KubernetesOperations

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KubernetesClient

    public interface KubernetesOperations
    Defines the HTTP requests to query the Kubernetes API.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
    See Also:
    Kubernetes API overview

      • listServices

        @Get(value="/namespaces/{namespace}/services?labelSelector={labelSelector}")
org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ServiceList> listServices(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String labelSelector)
        List services in the specified namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - Object name and auth scope, such as for teams and projects
        labelSelector - A selector to restrict the list of returned objects by their labels
        Returns:
        A list of services

      • watchConfigMaps

        @Get(value="/namespaces/{namespace}/configmaps?resourceVersion={resourceVersion}&labelSelector={labelSelector}&watch=true")
 @Consumes(value={"application/x-json-stream","application/json"})
org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ConfigMapWatchEvent> watchConfigMaps(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long resourceVersion,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String labelSelector)
        Watch objects of kind ConfigMap.
        Parameters:
        namespace - object name and auth scope, such as for teams and projects
        resourceVersion - the resource version to receive events from. If set to 0, Kubernetes will send all events
        labelSelector - A selector to restrict the list of returned objects by their labels
        Returns:
        a ConfigMapList
